content: Does anyone have prior art for mapping the v2 OBR-12 "Danger Code" field to DiagnosticReport and friends? The field definition says "any known or suspected patient or specimen hazards, e.g., patient with active tuberculosis or blood from a hepatitis patient". Seems like it might overlap slightly with https://www.hl7.org/fhir/extension-specimen-specialhandling.html, but it's not really the same thing.
If not I'll create a CodeableConcept extension on DiagnosticReport.
isn't that something to go on the request, not the report?
True, this is me being confused by the ambiguity of OBRs. DiagnosticOrder then.
yes. but you mightn't want to take my comment as gospel...
Well this is awkward, I've already started illuminating it on parchment
